item.description:
Colt State Park
Route 114, Bristol, Rhode Island 02809
401-253-7482

Let’s meet at Colt State Park at 12:00pm for an afternoon of fun in the sun!!!
This is a georgous location on the water in RI.
Check it out on the web site: http://www.riparks.co...

The weather will be perfect!!!
Pack a cooler
Bring toys – frizbee, balls, board games, cards
Lots of choices- bike, roller blade, or hike the path

We can carpool, or caravan.
Look for a large rainbow umbrella.
I will send you my cell phone number when you rsvp.
item.how_to_find_us: look for the rainbow umbrella, or call my cell phone by 12:30pm
item.name: Fun in the Sun at COLT STATE PARK
